African Botanics Vita C Corrector

Brand: African Botanics

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: C9-12 Alkanes, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate (Vitamin C), Caprylic/ Capric Triglyceride, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Squalane, Coco - Caprylate/Caprate, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Cylindrotheca Fusiformis (Marin

ca Fusiformis (Marine Blue Micro-algae) Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Sclerocarya Birrea (Marula) Seed Oil. Formulated without essential oils and fragrance.

Directions: Daily AM and/or PM. Apply after cleansing, toning/exfoliating, dispense 1-2 pumps to the areas where uneven skin tone is present or all over your face, neck and decollet

e, neck and decollete with uplifting strokes

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
